arts.ttl: ‘Full of Belief’: Chris Sutton Predicts Result of Everton v Aston Villa
arts.sum: Pundit Chris Sutton has predicted the result of tomorrow’s game against Aston Villa. Everton welcome the Villains to BMD following the international break, which disrupted a strong run of form. The Blues have won three on the spin in all competitions, with impressive performances both at home and on the road. Indeed, Sutton insists Everton will be ‘full of belief’ ahead of the game, but states that Villa will return home with a point. arts.ttl: "It's a huge game for us"-David Moyes previews Aston Villa clash
arts.sum: David Moyes's side sit 5th in the Premier League and victory over Aston Villa could be a statement win in what Everton's aspirations are this seasons. The Blues manager was high in praise for Unai Emery and is anticipating a tough game against the midlands club despite their early struggles so far this season.
